author: jleroux
msg: I found that often you need to differentiate patches between staging and production (URLs, etc.). So adding sub-dirs here

author: rpluem
msg: * Make trunk compile with APR trunk again (without LDAP support of course), by
ensuring that we only include the include files of the APR / APU LDAP API if
we use 1.x. Move stuff that depends on it inside the APR_HAS_LDAP block.

author: hansbak
msg: contactlist emails, chamge from forms to url's because forms not always work with several email clients.

author: djencks
msg: update to build against current osgi-friendly code

author: bodewig
msg: tar archives containing sparse entries in POSIX formats generated using GNU tar with --format=posix and --sparse-version=X.Y where X and Y correspond to the file posixXY_sparse.tar.  COMPRESS-124
